009package imagingbook.pub.geometry.hulls;
010
011import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.isZero;
012import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.radius;
014import static imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix.add;
015import static imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix.multiply;
016import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
017
018import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
019import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntDouble;
020
021/**
022 * Represents a major axis-aligned bounding box of a 2D point set.
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 * @version 2021/10/11
026 * 
027 */
028public class AxisAlignedBoundingBox {
029        
030        private final Pnt2d[] boundingBox;      
031        
032        public AxisAlignedBoundingBox(Iterable<Pnt2d> points) {
033                this.boundingBox = makeBox(points);
034        }
035        
036        /**
037         * Returns an array holding the 4 corner points of the bounding box or 
038         * {@code null} if the orientation of the point set is undefined.
039         * @return as described above
040         */
041        public Pnt2d[] getCornerPoints() {
042                return (boundingBox == null) ? null : boundingBox;
043        }
044                
045        /**
046         * Calculates the major axis-aligned bounding box of 
047         * the supplied region, as a sequence of four point
048         * coordinates (p0, p1, p2, p3).
049         * 
050         * @param points binary region
051         * @return the region's bounding box as a sequence of 4 coordinates (p0, p1, p2, p3)
052         */
053        private Pnt2d[] makeBox(Iterable<Pnt2d> points) {
054                //double theta = getOrientationAngle(points);
055                
056                double[] xy = getOrientationVector(points);
057                if (xy == null) {       // regin's orientation is undefined
058                        return null;
059                }
060                        
061                double xa = xy[0]; // = Math.cos(theta);
062                double ya = xy[1]; // = Math.sin(theta);
063                double[] ea = {xa,  ya};
064                double[] eb = {ya, -xa};
065                
066                double amin = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
067                double amax = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
068                double bmin = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
069                double bmax = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
070                
071                for (Pnt2d p : points) {
072                        double u = p.getX();
073                        double v = p.getY();
074                        double a = u * xa + v * ya;     // project (u,v) on the major axis vector
075                        double b = u * ya - v * xa;     // project (u,v) on perpendicular vector
076                        amin = Math.min(a, amin);
077                        amax = Math.max(a, amax);
078                        bmin = Math.min(b, bmin);
079                        bmax = Math.max(b, bmax);
080                }
081                
082                Pnt2d[] corners = new Pnt2d[4];
083                corners[0] = PntDouble.from(add(multiply(amin, ea), multiply(bmin, eb)));
084                corners[1] = PntDouble.from(add(multiply(amin, ea), multiply(bmax, eb)));
085                corners[2] = PntDouble.from(add(multiply(amax, ea), multiply(bmax, eb)));
086                corners[3] = PntDouble.from(add(multiply(amax, ea), multiply(bmin, eb)));
087                return corners;
088        }
089
090        private double[] getOrientationVector(Iterable<Pnt2d> points) {
091                double[] centroid = getCentroid(points);
092                final double xc = centroid[0];
093                final double yc = centroid[1];
094                double mu20 = 0;
095                double mu02 = 0;
096                double mu11 = 0;
097
098                for (Pnt2d p : points) {
099                        double dx = (p.getX() - xc);
100                        double dy = (p.getY() - yc);
101                        mu20 = mu20 + dx * dx;
102                        mu02 = mu02 + dy * dy;
103                        mu11 = mu11 + dx * dy;
104                }
105                
106                double A = 2 * mu11;
107                double B = mu20 - mu02;
108                
109                double xTheta = B + sqrt(sqr(A) + sqr(B));
110                double yTheta = A;
111                double d = radius(xTheta, yTheta);
112                
113                return (isZero(d)) ? null : new double[] {xTheta / d, yTheta / d};
114        }
115        
116        private double[] getCentroid(Iterable<Pnt2d> points) {
117                int n = 0;
118                double su = 0;
119                double sv = 0;
120                for (Pnt2d p : points) {
121                        su += p.getX();
122                        sv += p.getY();
123                        n++;
124                }
125                if (n == 0) {
126                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("empty point sequence!");
127                }
128                return new double[] {su/n, sv/n};
129        }
130        
131}
